players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked Diana is dead. Charlie, why were you silent? That seems odd."
You: "I'm also curious about Charlie's silence. Charlie, what do you have to say?"
You: "Charlie, your silence last round is still bothering me. Please explain."
Bob: "Alice makes a good point. Charlie, please explain your silence, or I might have to vote for you."
Charlie: "I remained silent because I confirmed Bob was the mafioso. If I had said anything, he might have figured out my strategy and continued his lie."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
